MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Mitosis | d: Genetics

MCQ: What allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Photosynthesis | b: Energy processing | c: Cell division | d: DNA replication

MCQ: What do biologists use to make observations, pose questions, and form conclusions?
Choices: a: Magic | b: Intuition | c: Scientific method | d: Guesswork

MCQ: Which type of organisms contribute to the biodiversity of an ecosystem?
Choices: a: Only plants | b: Only animals | c: Both plants and animals | d: Only bacteria
